name: Desktop Birthday Card Sender
short_description: This project aim is to Send Birthday/ Anniversary wishes automatically,all the details are storedlocally and program interacts with the web based Mail server (Google or yahoo or such servers) and send pre configured messages/ Cards on Time scheduled.
